descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Besiege VR lets you:
- 🚃 choose from 25 wild machines (+ 2 new Halloween ones!)
- 🛠️ customize them or build totally your own 

... and drive it to total devastation - yours or your foes’ - delivering just as much fun in epic failures as in steady progress!

# 🛩️ Kickstart Your Destruction

Choose from 25 built-in machines for instant mayhem.

[media]

# 🛠️ From One Block to a BANG!

Build anything you can imagine with dozens of interactive parts.

[media]

# 💥 Explosive amount of content

Wreak havoc across a 55-level campaign and 3 open sandbox worlds.

[media]

# 🌎 Share Your Creations

Endless replayability powered by the Workshop community creations.

--------

# 💡 Short & sweet video tutorials 

To get you going in 5 mins!



# 💻 Import your works from Steam

Own a PC version of Besiege? Import your machines and drive them in VR!
